title: 命令方块
author: 小号和大号
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 末影矿工
replies.txt_content: /execute @e[type=Villager] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~2 ~ 方块，要用高频红石

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
村民头上有方块:
/replaceitem entity @e[type=Villager] slot.armor.head minecraft:方块名称

replies.author: LBL~
replies.txt_content: 你是看籽岷的立方体的吧
